    Extract single equation data frame

    Source: R/subset.R
    get_eqn.Rd

    Extract single equation data frame

    Usage

    get_eqn(key, equation_type = "impressionabo", gender = "average")

    Arguments

    key

    the name of the equation set, Call eqn_info() or see package readme for options.

    equation_type

    the type of the equation. Options: emotionid, impressionabo, impressionabos, selfdir, traitid

    gender

    gender. Average, female, or male.

    Value

    equation dataframe

    Examples

    get_eqn("us2010")
#>            V1    V2    V3    V4    V5    V6    V7    V8    V9   V10
#> 1  Z000000000 -0.16 -0.06 -0.05 -0.26  0.09  0.21 -0.18  0.00 -0.14
